*

Metamontano

May 21, 2011

Montano awoke and immediately sat down at his computer to type in his newest entry-another Fern and Kale dream. But what to call it? ‘Fern and Kale’? No, that had been used already. His excitement was great as his fingers flew across the keyboard. But still-what title to give it? (Fern: “Excuse me, madame, but would you mind squaring your feet off?”)
